title: Eldritch Knight
content:
every 6 Fighter levels starting at level 3, up to level 2 spells. Cantrips: Starts with 2 Cantrips at level 3 (gains additional cantrips at level 10) Spell Save DC: 8 + your Proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier Spell Attack Modifier: your Proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier Known Spells: Wizard spell list. Eldritch Knight Spells are Always Prepared. Spell List: Known Casters. Cannot change equiped spells freely. Can only swap equiped spells on level up. Ritual Casting: No

B
